name: Cell (itch) (ZaiusPanda)
description:
You two are cells.  The goal is to hurt the enemy cell. In order to do that, you have to infect neutral bacteria, which will chase the enemy. You cannot damage your enemy directly, but you are not that helpless since you are provided with two abillities: dash and parry. 

- Mouse and gamepad controller needed (Xbox Controller).
